...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY FOR

.AN UPPER LEVEL STORM SYSTEM WILL PASS NORTH OF THE REGION 
SUNDAY...RESULTING IN INCREASED WIND SPEEDS IN THE GUADALUPE

...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY...

* EVENT...HIGH WINDS.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A HIGH WIND WARNING MEANS A HAZARDOUS HIGH WIND EVENT IS EXPECTED
OR OCCURRING.  SUSTAINED WIND SPEEDS OF AT LEAST 40 MPH OR GUSTS
OF 58 MPH OR MORE CAN LEAD TO PROPERTY DAMAGE.
